ComicInfo.Summary:
INFINITY SCORE continues!
Infinity Stones are incredibly powerful but only get more so when in proximity to the other stones.
Felicia Hardy has gathered three out of the six, and the Marvel Universe may be completely hosed.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Pepe Larraz & Alejandro Sanchez | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Pepe Larraz & Frank Martin | 2 | | Var | Connecting Variant Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino & Brian Reber | 3 | | Var | Miles Morales 10th Anniversary Variant Cover | Dike Ruan & Dave McCaig | 4 |
ComicInfo.Title: Infinity Score Part 3
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alejandro Sanchez,Brian Reber,Dave McCaig,Dike Ruan,Emanuela Lupacchino,Frank Martin Jr.,Pepe Larraz
